response.overview: Priya is fighting sadness in her family home while odd things happen all around her. On the other hand, a pair of aspirational boys, Suman and Chakri, take advantage of the shadowy corners of the internet to amass a fortune. Will Priya make her way through the approaching darkness? Will Suman and Chakri find forgiveness before their deeds get out of hand?
response.title: Kapati
